formulas.name: APU_End_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!APU_Start_Date}), 1, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3)/5)*2, 3, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!APU_Start_Date}) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, 7, ({!APU_Start_Date}) - IF(3>0,1,0) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: APU_Start_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Investment_End_Date}), 1, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + FLOOR((2-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + FLOOR((2)/5)*2, 3, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + FLOOR((2+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + FLOOR((2+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + FLOOR((2+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Investment_End_Date}) + 2 + CEILING((2)/5)*2, 7, ({!Investment_End_Date}) - IF(2>0,1,0) + 2 + CEILING((2)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: AVsight_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Avsight_StartDate}), 1, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3)/5)*2, 3, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, 7, ({!Avsight_StartDate}) - IF(3>0,1,0) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Avsight_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!Material_EndDate}

formulas.name: CommercialAgreement_End_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}), 1, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + FLOOR((30-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + FLOOR((30)/5)*2, 3, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, 7, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) - IF(30>0,1,0) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: CommercialAgreement_Start_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!TechnicalEndDate}), 1, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + FLOOR((1-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + FLOOR((1)/5)*2, 3, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + FLOOR((1+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + FLOOR((1+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + FLOOR((1+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) + 1 + CEILING((1)/5)*2, 7, ({!TechnicalEndDate}) - IF(1>0,1,0) + 1 + CEILING((1)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Disassembly_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Disassembly_Start_Date}), 1, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + FLOOR((21-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + FLOOR((21)/5)*2, 3, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + FLOOR((21+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + FLOOR((21+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + FLOOR((21+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 21 + CEILING((21)/5)*2, 7, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) - IF(21>0,1,0) + 21 + CEILING((21)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Disassembly_Start_Date
formulas.expression: {!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}

formulas.name: Hotlist_EndDate
formulas.expression: {!Hotlist_StartDate}

formulas.name: Hotlist_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!Recon_StartDate}

formulas.name: Investment_End_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Investment_Start_Date}), 1, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3)/5)*2, 3, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, 7, ({!Investment_Start_Date}) - IF(3>0,1,0) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Investment_Start_Date
formulas.expression: {!Physical_End_Date}

formulas.name: Material_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Material_StartDate}), 1, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + FLOOR((30-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + FLOOR((30)/5)*2, 3, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + FLOOR((30+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, 7, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) - IF(30>0,1,0) + 30 + CEILING((30)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Material_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!ShipmentMat_EndDate}

formulas.name: NotificationBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.GlicW__Project_Milestone__r.Name} + " has been created with the following Project Task: " + {!$Record.Name} + TEXT({!$Record.GlicW__Start_Date__c}) + " the due date is on the " + TEXT({!$Record.GlicW__Due_Date__c})

formulas.name: Physical_End_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Physical_Start_Date}), 1, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + FLOOR((5-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + FLOOR((5)/5)*2, 3, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + FLOOR((5+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + FLOOR((5+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + FLOOR((5+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) + 5 + CEILING((5)/5)*2, 7, ({!Physical_Start_Date}) - IF(5>0,1,0) + 5 + CEILING((5)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Physical_Inspection
formulas.expression: {!CommercialAgreement_End_Date} + 15

formulas.name: Physical_Start_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}), 1, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + FLOOR((15-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + FLOOR((15)/5)*2, 3, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + FLOOR((15+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + FLOOR((15+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + FLOOR((15+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) + 15 + CEILING((15)/5)*2, 7, ({!CommercialAgreement_Start_Date}) - IF(15>0,1,0) + 15 + CEILING((15)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Recon_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Recon_StartDate}), 1, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3)/5)*2, 3, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Recon_StartDate}) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, 7, ({!Recon_StartDate}) - IF(3>0,1,0) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Recon_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!Disassembly_EndDate}

formulas.name: Repair_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!Hotlist_EndDate}

formulas.name: Repairs_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Repair_StartDate}), 1, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7)/5)*2, 3, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Repair_StartDate}) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, 7, ({!Repair_StartDate}) - IF(7>0,1,0) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Return_End_Date
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Return_StartDate}), 1, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3)/5)*2, 3, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + FLOOR((3+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Return_StartDate}) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, 7, ({!Return_StartDate}) - IF(3>0,1,0) + 3 + CEILING((3)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Return_StartDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Disassembly_Start_Date}), 1, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + FLOOR((8-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + FLOOR((8)/5)*2, 3, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + FLOOR((8+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + FLOOR((8+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + FLOOR((8+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) + 8 + CEILING((8)/5)*2, 7, ({!Disassembly_Start_Date}) - IF(8>0,1,0) + 8 + CEILING((8)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!APU_End_Date}

formulas.name: Shipment_to_Dissaembly_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}), 1, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7)/5)*2, 3, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, 7, ({!Shipment_to_Disassembly_StartDate}) - IF(7>0,1,0) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: ShipmentMat_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}), 1, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7)/5)*2, 3, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + FLOOR((7+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, 7, ({!ShipmentMat_StartDate}) - IF(7>0,1,0) + 7 + CEILING((7)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: ShipmentMat_StartDate
formulas.expression: {!Repairs_EndDate}

formulas.name: TechnicalEndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY({!TechnicalStartDate}), 1, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14-1)/5)*2, 2, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14)/5)*2, 3, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+1)/5)*2, 4, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+2)/5)*2, 5, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + FLOOR((14+3)/5)*2, 6, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) + 14 + CEILING((14)/5)*2, 7, ({!TechnicalStartDate}) - IF(14>0,1,0) + 14 + CEILING((14)/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: TechnicalStartDate
formulas.expression: {!$Flow.CurrentDate}
